programme.desc: (Encore) The band perform from a unique stage, set in the centre of London's O2 Arena, The pop idols give a unique and unbeatable show. programme.title: 天蝎行动 Coup De Scorpion - EP 21
programme.desc: (R) The story begins with Ye Lin being sent to South Africa on work assignment where she meets the dashing Xie Ting Zhang. In a whirlwind of romance, the couple falls in love and exchange marital vows. Tragedy strikes when Xie gets mysteriously killed by mobsters. The disheartened Ye returns to Singapore and starts life anew in a jewelry group run by young entrepreneur Zheng Nan Shun. Nan takes a liking to Ye and begins to pursue er. Just as Ye was about to accept and marry Nan, Yan resurfaces.... (重)《天蝎行动》主要讲述，被骗至南非数载，全部家产都被 郑南顺 (李南星 饰) 的父亲夺走的 谢廷璋 (李铭顺 饰) 与年轻的珠宝鉴定师 叶林 (陈松伶 饰) 在南非相爱成婚。因为黑吃黑被黑帮追杀，廷璋诈死后来到新加坡才知道郑父已故，廷璋发现不知内情的南顺继承了大笔财产而且对叶颇有好感，为复仇廷璋制定了“天蝎行动”，并放弃了叶林，与同被郑父害死父母的律师王重光配合，先帮南顺对付他的对手郭保罗，令郭保罗生意破产，公司也被南顺收购。并助南顺登上珠宝业主席的宝座。同时南顺向叶林求婚成功。然而就在南顺和叶林注册的那一天，郑母出车祸身亡，买凶杀人的郭保罗逃走了。而南顺将和叶林结婚的前夕，又收到叶林当年和廷璋在南非结婚的资料。此事对叶林伤害极深，她在教堂逃婚了。.

programme.title: 那些年,我们一起玩的游戏 The Games We Played - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Bring the whole family on a trip down memory lane with a new gameshow that's guaranteed to make you nostalgic! Hosted by Mark Lee and Shane Pow, watch teams battle it out over games like "Pepsi Cola 1, 2, 3", "Goli", "Five Stone", "Chapteh" and "Zero Point"! Game locations include old places like Bras Basah Complex, Haw Par Villa and Pulau Ubin! (重)(最后一集)还记得那些年，我们一起玩的游戏吗？没有智能手机、没得上网的时代，我们打弹珠、跳Zero Point，踢毽子、抛五粒米，玩tikam-tikam⋯童年过得单纯又精彩！全新怀旧户外游戏节目，让李国煌与包勋评两位"老少配主持"，带大家去缅怀简旧日简单快乐的游戏时光！.

Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)(重)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 天蝎行动 Coup De Scorpion - EP 22
programme.desc: (R) The story begins with Ye Lin being sent to South Africa on work assignment where she meets the dashing Xie Ting Zhang. In a whirlwind of romance, the couple falls in love and exchange marital vows. Tragedy strikes when Xie gets mysteriously killed by mobsters. The disheartened Ye returns to Singapore and starts life anew in a jewelry group run by young entrepreneur Zheng Nan Shun. Nan takes a liking to Ye and begins to pursue er. Just as Ye was about to accept and marry Nan, Yan resurfaces.... (重)《天蝎行动》主要讲述，被骗至南非数载，全部家产都被 郑南顺 (李南星 饰) 的父亲夺走的 谢廷璋 (李铭顺 饰) 与年轻的珠宝鉴定师 叶林 (陈松伶 饰) 在南非相爱成婚。因为黑吃黑被黑帮追杀，廷璋诈死后来到新加坡才知道郑父已故，廷璋发现不知内情的南顺继承了大笔财产而且对叶颇有好感，为复仇廷璋制定了“天蝎行动”，并放弃了叶林，与同被郑父害死父母的律师王重光配合，先帮南顺对付他的对手郭保罗，令郭保罗生意破产，公司也被南顺收购。并助南顺登上珠宝业主席的宝座。同时南顺向叶林求婚成功。然而就在南顺和叶林注册的那一天，郑母出车祸身亡，买凶杀人的郭保罗逃走了。而南顺将和叶林结婚的前夕，又收到叶林当年和廷璋在南非结婚的资料。此事对叶林伤害极深，她在教堂逃婚了。.

programme.title: 锁住味道 The Successor - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) To support the family, the mother-in-law of Madam Lim had to set up a stall under a tree at Joo Chiat Road selling homemade rice dumplings (Bak Zhang). The secret recipe was soon passed down to Madam Lim as she enters the family, and it is her duty now to pass it down to the next generation. (重)粽子本是端午节的特有食品，如今成了人们天天都能享受到的传统美食。林海伦师傅在嫁入夫家后，便和家婆学习制作传统粽子。家婆当年靠着在如切路的大树下开档卖粽子，养活一家人。林师傅紧记教诲，传承了旧式女性持家的毅力，坚守着传统娘惹人家媳妇的本份。她希望家里的每一分子都能学会制作粽子，让这门手艺可以代代相传。.

(重)《名厨出走记》是个另类的美食节目. 制作队安排平常习惯在宽敞、设备齐全厨房工作的厨师们出走，带他们到深山林中，让他们就地取材，用巧手煮出另类料理。也借由节目，让厨师利用他们的长才为落后地区付出他们的一份力. 该节目荣获《红星大奖》多个奖项，而《精华版》更收集了该节目最精彩的集数，让观众重温厨师们的苦与乐！.

(重)第二系列的"仁心侠旅"，主持人前往亚洲各地去关注更多不平不公的社会现象。本系列将眼光锁定在亚洲长期存在的几个棘手问题-粮食和食水不足，基本医疗缺乏，以及弱势群体的极端边缘化。.

programme.title: 前线追踪 Frontline - EP 38
programme.desc: Four mums who deliver free food everyday, a young man who braved minus 40 degrees on an expedition trip, a 13-year-old boy who holds an art exhibition, and a 83-year-old elderly who offers shelter to sick elderly. They have one thing in common - kindness and compassion. We look at the reasons behind their acts and what motivates them to keep on going. 送免费饭菜给有需人士的四位妈妈，为了帮癌症病患筹款到零下40度的蒙古探险的青年，利用绘画天赋为有需要孩子卖画筹款的13岁男孩，以及无条件照顾患病老人的83岁伯伯。这期节目带你走入这些善心人士的世界，了解他们善举背后的意义和动力。.

The disheartened Ye returns to Singapore and starts life anew in a jewelry group run by young entrepreneur Zheng Nan Shun. Nan takes a liking to Ye and begins to pursue er. Just as Ye was about to accept and marry Nan, Yan resurfaces.... (重)《天蝎行动》主要讲述，被骗至南非数载，全部家产都被 郑南顺 (李南星 饰) 的父亲夺走的 谢廷璋 (李铭顺 饰) 与年轻的珠宝鉴定师 叶林 (陈松伶 饰) 在南非相爱成婚。因为黑吃黑被黑帮追杀，廷璋诈死后来到新加坡才知道郑父已故，廷璋发现不知内情的南顺继承了大笔财产而且对叶颇有好感，为复仇廷璋制定了“天蝎行动”，并放弃了叶林，与同被郑父害死父母的律师王重光配合，先帮南顺对付他的对手郭保罗，令郭保罗生意破产，公司也被南顺收购。并助南顺登上珠宝业主席的宝座。同时南顺向叶林求婚成功。然而就在南顺和叶林注册的那一天，郑母出车祸身亡，买凶杀人的郭保罗逃走了。而南顺将和叶林结婚的前夕，又收到叶林当年和廷璋在南非结婚的资料。此事对叶林伤害极深，她在教堂逃婚了。.

However, as soon as the fire on the matchstick extinguishes, their wishes and illusions vanish. Lingling urges them to stop by telling them that the desires are just illusions, and wants them to face reality and work hard. Will the trio listen and change or will they continue on with their mistakes? (重)(最后一集)Tiger, 哲伦 和菲菲是死党。小组长玲玲聪明伶俐，不喜欢三人在学业上差劲的态度。有一天，Tiger 遇见一位给他"快乐火柴"的科学家。"快乐火柴"能够给三人无限的快乐，三人要什么就有什么。可是，当火柴一熄灭，他们的欲望和理想都会消失。玲玲劝他们脚踏实地，面对现实。三人会否听她的劝告改过自新还是死不悔改呢？.

This programme will introduce what is usually missed while you're in Little India. (重)相信国人对小印度都不陌生，但大家有真正的走进去看看吗？这一次，权怡凤连同黃俊融将带领一群观众，去探索小印度。第一次踏进印度庙，了解一下他们的宗教和文化。还有横街窄巷有许多的壁画、街头艺术，最热门的打卡点，平时没有留意到的，在节目中都有介绍。.

programme.desc: (R) With the arrival of the new century, crime is constantly manifesting itself in different ways. programme.desc: A passionate dreamer Woody, along with a baby pet dinosaur Moga, sets path to become the best pet trainer. Join Woody's journey as the action and comedy will keep your futuristic stone-age era a worthwhile adventure! 讲述梦想成为驯兽师的小男孩Woody与小宠物恐龙摩加（Moga）如何成为最佳宠物教练的冒险道路。.

programme.title: 搜密.打卡.小红点 Little Red Dot Detectives - EP 13
programme.desc: At Bedok and East Coast, the hosts go beyond the ordinary and explore quirky places, from a traditional Nanyang Soy Sauce Boutique to a fascinating Ant Exhibition! programme.title: 星期二特写 - 飞羽 Tuesday Report - Migratory Birds - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Bird ringing is full of challenges, especially in trapping the whimbrels to put on the satellite trackers. A Chinese bird hunter also came to help with his expertise in mimicking bird calls. After a year of satellite tracking, NParks has successfully in tracking the routes taken. Besides Sungei Buloh Wetland Reserve, Kranji Marshes and Chek Jawa are the next two ideal places for bird watching. (重)候鸟保育的环志工作充满挑战。特别是在捕捉特定水鸟—中杓鹬，让牠们戴上卫星追踪仪，过程更是困难重重。国家公园局也请来了中国的捕鸟专家，以他的拿手绝活，模仿鸟叫声，引诱鸟儿入网。一年来的卫星追踪终于取得成效，国家公园局准确地掌握了这些水鸟的行踪。除了双溪布洛湿地保护区，克兰芝湿地和乌敏岛的仄爪哇，也是观测迁徙水鸟的最佳去处。这是因为政府和民间团体，还有义工们携手打造了这些适合水鸟栖息的环境。这些地方原来是政府准备作为经济和军事发展用途。在新加坡自然学会和民众等努力的争取之下，都被保留了下来。2018年，万礼红树林和滩涂也被划分为自然公园，为观鸟活动增添一个好去处。.

The two of them were invited to a birthday party but Xiao Yi has to give it a miss as he has to take care of Shun Tian. In the end, Xin Xin went to the party alone. Zhi Guo saw Xin Xin at the party and tries to take advantage of the situation by making advances at her. (重)为了各自照顾父母，心心和孝义只好分居两地。有模特儿邀请两人出席生日舞会，孝义要照顾顺天，心心只好独自出席，心感失落，治国乘虚而入。孝义请顺天的老朋友来陪爸爸，赶到舞会与心心共舞，治国见了感妒忌。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 295
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 心点心 Heart To Heart - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Xiao Li is curious about Liang Gui's identity as a master chef, and goads him into showing off his cooking skills. Liang Gui fall for her trick but eventually failed, and ended up packing food from restaurant to pass off as his own. Xiao Li exposes his lie, Liang Gui could not accept and ran away. (重)萧丽对梁贵的大厨身份感到好奇，以激将法怂恿他再显身手。梁贵中计，架势十足地准备起来，但最后却失败收场，只好到煮炒档买回来，对萧丽谎称全部是他自己煮的。萧丽戳破他的谎言，梁贵无法相信，发狂地跑掉。.

programme.title: 攻星计 After The Stars - EP 11

programme.title: 陈情令 The Untamed - EP 1
programme.desc: Wei Wuxian, Jiang Yanli and Jiang Cheng go to the Gusu Lan sect for studies. They lost the invitation card and are blocked on arrival. Wei Wuxian returns to the inn to pick up the invitation card. By the time he returns, Jiang Yanli and the rest have been taken up the mountain by Wang Lanji. (PG)(首播)魏无羡和江厌离、江澄一行人前往姑苏蓝氏的云深不知处求学。到姑苏蓝氏的山下，因不见了请帖被阻拦。魏无羡只好返回客栈去取请帖，当他回来的时，江厌离一行人已经被蓝忘机带到了山上。.

programme.title: 天蝎行动 Coup De Scorpion - EP 24
programme.desc: (R) The story begins with Ye Lin being sent to South Africa on work assignment where she meets the dashing Xie Ting Zhang. In a whirlwind of romance, the couple falls in love and exchange marital vows. Tragedy strikes when Xie gets mysteriously killed by mobsters. The disheartened Ye returns to Singapore and starts life anew in a jewelry group run by young entrepreneur Zheng Nan Shun. Nan takes a liking to Ye and begins to pursue er. Just as Ye was about to accept and marry Nan, Yan resurfaces.... (重)《天蝎行动》主要讲述，被骗至南非数载，全部家产都被 郑南顺 (李南星 饰) 的父亲夺走的 谢廷璋 (李铭顺 饰) 与年轻的珠宝鉴定师 叶林 (陈松伶 饰) 在南非相爱成婚。因为黑吃黑被黑帮追杀，廷璋诈死后来到新加坡才知道郑父已故，廷璋发现不知内情的南顺继承了大笔财产而且对叶颇有好感，为复仇廷璋制定了“天蝎行动”，并放弃了叶林，与同被郑父害死父母的律师王重光配合，先帮南顺对付他的对手郭保罗，令郭保罗生意破产，公司也被南顺收购。并助南顺登上珠宝业主席的宝座。同时南顺向叶林求婚成功。然而就在南顺和叶林注册的那一天，郑母出车祸身亡，买凶杀人的郭保罗逃走了。而南顺将和叶林结婚的前夕，又收到叶林当年和廷璋在南非结婚的资料。此事对叶林伤害极深，她在教堂逃婚了。.

programme.title: 真的不一样 Fake It So Real - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Fish is one of the main human protein sources. Lee Teng goes to Malaysia to experience the harvesting of fishes from sea. He also introduces various fish farming methods in Singapore and Australia. He even visits Tsukiji Market in Tokyo to take a glimpse of the exciting auction of the Bluefin Tuna. (重)食用鱼，人类主要的蛋白质来源之一。李腾前往马来西亚的渔村，跟随渔民出海体验捕捞野生食用鱼。他也会穿梭于本地及澳洲，介绍各种人工养殖食用鱼的方法。李腾还深入东京筑地市场，带领观众一窥精彩的黑鲔鱼拍卖会！.

programme.desc: (R) Kent Ng is a well-travelled business executive retired from working for global multinational company. He enjoys cooking self-styled healthy Asian dishes. Today's menu includes Healthy Salad with unique homemade dressing, Baked Chicken Wings with homebrewed rice wine, Antioxidant Riceberry with Pumpkin and etc. Sounds interesting? His guests are singles from Speed Dating Agency. Do they like Kent's food? Let's find out in "Home Dining"! (重)黄文兴曾担任跨国企业高管，由于厌倦了忙碌生活，目前处于退休状态，他和妻子喜欢烹饪宴客，于是做起了私房菜。他为宾客精心准备的自创健康料理，包括了芦荟枣蜜沙拉、红糟鸡翅和紫香米金瓜饭等。今天的客人是来自红娘公司的8对单身男女，他们会喜欢文兴做的菜肴吗？欢迎你一起来"开门见餐"！.

programme.title: 新过番客 A Sojourn Home - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) "A Sojourn Home" follows foreign workers from India, Bangladesh, the Philippines, Myanmar, Indonesia and more who came to Singapore to find a living. The series documents how some make it big and return home with affluence, while others are disappointed and forced to leave crestfallen. The series highlights their determination and will-power to succeed, showing us a side of foreign workers we normally do not see. (重)《新过番客》关注着一些来自印度，孟加拉，菲律宾，缅甸，印度尼西亚国家等等的外劳。他们离家背景，远来到新加坡发展和赚钱养家。这一系列的纪录片让我们看到他们的成功与失败，有些富裕的回到家乡，有些却因失败而被迫离开。这纪录片显示了他们坚强的意志，决心和勇往直前的精神，让我们看到他们的另一面。.

programme.title: 极件任务 Mission Delivery - EP 8
programme.desc: It's never been easy to transport animals, let alone an agile one that weighs 500kg. Let's follow our task force to the birthplace of horses to check out how they are prepped before embarking their journey to Singapore, and what "challenges" they need to overcome before settling in their new home. 动物要出远门可不简单，更何况是重达500公斤、天生好动的马匹。让我们跟随特派员前往马匹的出生地，看马匹们在运输之前，需要做些什么准备功夫；之后又如何抵达新加坡，在入住新家之前还要面对什么“挑战”。.

programme.title: 星期二特写 - 飞羽 Tuesday Report - Migratory Birds - EP 3
攻星计 After The Stars - EP 12
programme.desc: A reporter from a gossip magazine chases Guo Yao with a photograph of Guo Yao hugging Xiao Yu, questioning the relations between the two. Guo Yu and Yi Ting looks for the chief editor of that magazine, denying all rumours. Yi Ting witnesses Guo Yu's problem solve in such situations, causing her admiration for him to increase. (PG)有八卦杂志记者拍到郭瑶紧抱小雨的照片，追问两人关系。国瑜带着怡婷往找八卦杂志的主编，否认郭瑶一切传闻。怡婷目睹国瑜的处理手法，对他更是仰慕。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news. 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 女人好健康 Good Health Women - EP 12
programme.desc: Darren hosts this new healthcare program that explores both Western & traditional approaches to womens illnesses from a male perspective. 主持庄文杰这次担任女人健康大使，找来中医、西医、物理治疗师从多个角度分享女人健康密码，了解与预防女人常见的毛病如经痛，中风，慢性疲劳等等。.

programme.title: 整形背后 Plastic Surgery Is My Business - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Gracia and Lily are two different women facing different problems with their looks, but they have similar insecurities and anxieties. How does body image weigh in as a decisive factor for getting plastic surgery, and how does the plastic surgeon ensure a healthy balance between function and form? (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)两名妇女Gracia 和 Lily 都以为自己的容貌问题而找上了姚国龙整形外科医生。在听取了她们各自的要求后，整形外科医生要如何在功能与外观之间找到健康的平衡点呢？.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Wei Yun's car gets burned down. Eric, who had been driving the car, is nowhere to be found, and everyone thinks he has met with misfortune. Eric quietly looks for Brother Fa to explain to him about the situation and seeks for his support. Brother Fa is sceptical about it and arranges to meet with Wei Yun. Wei Yun passes Brother Fa the audio recording of their conversation that she has secretly recorded and tells him that she believes Eric is being framed. (PG)(重)维芸的车子被烧毁，驾车的Eric下落不明，众人以为他凶多吉少。Eric悄然找上发哥，说出前因后果，寻求支援。发哥将信将疑，约维芸见面。维芸把她偷录的Eric的对话录音交给发哥，告诉发哥她相信Eric是被陷害的，他不是盗领案的主谋。.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Eric learns from the news that Wei Yun is putting herself in danger by investigating the case. He couldn't help but show up in front of Wei Yun as he is worried about her. Seeing that Eric is still alive, Wei Yun excitedly rushes forward to hug him and cries in his arms. Eric is surprised and touched by her action. Wei Yun tells Eric that she saw Dong Huang. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)Eric从新闻中得知维芸因追查建案，人身遭受威胁，担心不已，终于忍不住在维芸面前现身。维芸见到Eric还活着，激动地冲上前抱住他，在Eric怀里哭了起來。Eric被她这个举动所打动，同时又有些意外。维芸告诉Eric，自己见过栋煌。.

programme.title: 谁来晚餐2019 Guess Who 2019 - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Celebrities will be invited to visit a family and join them for dinner. The family will have no idea who the celebrity will be beforehand. The invited celebrity will share his or her experience with the family through conversation during a meal. (重)“谁来晚餐”是个时下颇为流行的实况电视节目. 每集节目都拜访一个家庭,并邀请他们的梦幻嘉宾上门共进晚餐.内容没有太多刻意的安排, 也许是小小梦想的完成, 也可能会看到名人卸下包装与身段之后的真情流露。.

programme.title: 极境之旅 Forbidding No More - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) In this debut episode of "Forbidding No More," host Alberto Ge travelled to Cuba, a Central American country that has been economically sanctioned by the US government for nearly half a century. Cuba today has seen a rapid rise of tourists visiting it for its richness in history and culture. (重)跨越种种距离，揭开神秘面纱，《极境之旅》来到共产主义统治下的古巴，这个被美国经济制裁近半世纪、丰富多彩又萧条的国家。到古巴旅游，首先到哈瓦那，在七彩缤纷的老爷车不停穿梭的城市里，赴一场时空穿越之旅。.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 28
programme.desc: (R) Zhen-ai feels cheated by Xuncai when she suspects that Xuncai has kept his identity from her to test her. Xianghe goes to the office to give flowers to Zhen-ai. Yingshan witnesses the scene and dislikes Zhen-ai even more. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)真爱认定勋才当初一定是想试探她才故意不说出真实身份，觉得被欺骗。相赫到公司送真爱花，被英善看到，认为真爱对爱情不专一。.

programme.title: 嫉妒的化身 Jealousy Incarnate - EP 23
programme.desc: (R) Huaxin brings Nali to Xiuying's wedding and wants Xiuying to state who she favoured in the past. Seeing that Huaxin is very fond of Nali, Xiuying deliberately says she prefers Zhengyuan to him and even lists Huaxin's shortcomings. Huaxin is deeply affected by the revelation. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)华信以吃饭作为借口带着娜丽出席旧女友秀英的婚礼，他要秀英当着娜丽的面回答当年她更喜欢谁。秀英看出了华信很喜欢娜丽，故意说自己更喜欢正元，还列出了华信的一大堆缺点，让华信立即崩溃。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 35
programme.desc: Guangzhen tells Guifen that Tongxi is working in his company. Thereafter, he asks Guifen if he knows the whereabouts of his niece, Xianjing. Guifen insists that she does not know of Xianjing's existence. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)光真故意向贵芬透露他知道彤熙在他的公司工作，然后向她询问光浩的女儿贤静的下落。贵芬说她不知道贤静的存在。光真知道贵芬在装傻，但拿她没办法。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 36
programme.desc: The police informs Xianyu that there were two boys who were brought to the police station 20 years ago. One of them died in a car accident shortly after. As the deceased was wearing the same jacket as Shangyu was wearing in his profile picture, the police suspects that the deceased boy is Shangyu. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)警方突然又通知贤宇当天被带到警局的其实有两位男童，其中一位男童后来因车祸身亡。男童出车祸时所穿的外套跟尚宇在档案中穿的外套一模一样。警方于是推测尚宇已经死了。贤宇打击过大，晕倒。.

programme.title: 人间蒸发 Missing - EP 7
programme.desc: Many Cambodians worked abroad in search of a better living but many ended up missing. In 1970s under the Khmer Rouge rule Cambodia has nearly 2 million of its people either dead or vanished without a trace. What is the truth behind the disappearance? 在柬埔寨，许多人为了生存而出国工作，却从此人间蒸发。而70年代柬埔寨经历红色高棉政权统治三年八个月期间，许多人不是死亡，就是失踪。这些人失踪背后的真相，到底是什么？.

programme.title: 回转干探 Life On Mars - EP 15
programme.desc: The team suspects Liang Jishui is killed by someone from the police station. Taizhu s report causes Detective Li to be suspended from duty. He collaborates with the team to lure the murderer out. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)警队们怀疑梁吉水的死因另有乾坤。泰柱的报告书指出李刑警打犯人因此李遭停职。泰柱私下串通他演戏，以钓出警局里的内奸。.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Hao Sen travels to Taiwan to meet Wei Yun but unexpectedly sees Eric instead. Hao Sen is surprised when Eric tells Hao Sen that Yan Feng had been monitoring his every move. Eric requests Hao Sen to sign an agreement to ensure that he can continue to work at Teng Sheng after he returns to Singapore. Hao Sen agrees and wants Eric to continue to help him decrypt the files. (PG)(重)豪森应维芸之约，到台湾与她见面，没想到现身的却是Eric。Eric告诉豪森，延丰一直监视着他的一举一动，豪森感惊讶。Eric要求豪森签下协议书，保证自己返回新加坡之后，能继续在腾升工作。豪森答应，要Eric继续帮他解密档案。.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 14
programme.desc: (R) Picaud impersonates as Brother Fa and sends an email to Eric, resulting in Eric's laptop to be attacked by a virus and causing all of the files to be locked. Eric logs into cloud storage and is relieved he has made a backup of Linda's file. Eric says that he will try to fix the virus in his laptop and lets Brother Fa to investigate on Picaud's whereabouts. (PG)(重)Picaud假冒发哥的名字寄电邮给Eric，导致Eric的电脑中毒，所有档案都被锁住。Eric登入云端储存器，显示Linda的档案，幸好在云端做了备份。Eric表示自己会尝试解决电脑中毒问题，让发哥去调查Picaud的行踪。.

programme.title: 看见你的声音 I Can See Your Voice - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) "I Can See Your Voice" is a reality show in which guests must attempt to determine whether the contestant is a skilled vocalist or a tone-deaf contestant without hearing them sing. (重)《看見你的声音》是一档嘉宾凭视觉判断选手是否专业演唱实力还是音痴的新概念推理类音乐综艺节目。.

programme.title: 梦行者 Dream Walkers - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Chu Qing, Xiao Qing and Di Lun are childhood friends. One night, Di Lun followed a sleepwalking Chu Qing to a mysterious blue light. He tried to touch it but was rendered unconscious as a result. When he finally woke up, there was no sign of Chu Qing anymore. After realizing Tang Ning has no memory of herself since 8 years old, he cannot help but link it to Chu Qing's case, since she went missing at the same age too. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)当年晓晴跟妹妹初晴、狄伦，三人是自小一起长大的浩朋友。一次初晴梦游，走到屋外时，被狄伦看见了。狄伦跟着初晴，却看到神秘的蓝色荧光出现。狄伦想去碰荧光，却被强烈的光芒弄晕了，当他醒来之后，再也找不到初晴。狄伦得知唐凝8岁前的记忆是空白的，不禁觉得有些巧合，因为初晴也在8岁那年神秘失踪。.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 29
programme.desc: (R) Shanyu asks Caili to help out at Rouzi's eatery when Caili shows up uninvited again. Caili is tired out by the end of the day. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)采莉又到小菜店去。珊玉为了打发她，叫她去柔子即将开张的炸鸡店打扫，还要柔子给采莉一点苦头尝尝。采莉累坏。.

programme.title: 嫉妒的化身 Jealousy Incarnate - EP 24
programme.desc: (R) Zhiying misunderstands that Xiaohong has chosen to be raised by Meishu and feels very sad. Nali discovers many virtues of Zhengyuan after a period of interaction but Huaxin does not seem to have the same virtues. Despite that, however, Nali still likes Huaxin more. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)智英误会小红选择了跟随美淑，由美淑抚养，感到十分难过。经过一段时间的相处，娜丽发现了正元的许多优点，比如勤劳、有趣、体贴，而华信却没有那些优点。可是，纵使正元有那么多优点，但娜丽的心好像还是更倾向于华信。。。。。。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 37
programme.desc: Xianyu questions Mozi on her involvement in the doctored medical report that led to his father's death. Realizing that Xianyu is back for revenge, Mozi goes on her knees to beg him to let her go. Xianyu reports Mozi to the police for illegal medical practices. Mozi is arrested. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)贤宇质问尹末子当年为何伪造父亲的血液报告，令父亲因被街坊误会酒驾而走上绝路。末子发现贤宇就是那名司机的儿子，怕贤宇对她赶尽杀绝，跪地求饶。贤宇检举末子的非法医学勾当，导致末子被警方逮捕。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 38
programme.desc: Ting-en showers care and concern on Xianyu, but Xianyu is not appreciative and insists that he will not reconcile with her. Ting-en is heart-broken when Xianyu says he has been taking her for a ride all along. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)廷恩终于等到贤宇回家，但贤宇对她很冷淡，还说他们不会复合。廷恩坚持到贤宇家为他煮饭。贤宇不领情，要把她赶走，还说一直以来都在玩恋爱游戏。廷恩伤心不已。.

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 3 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 3 - EP 11
programme.desc: Hosted by Bai Xinyi, this food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. 介绍台湾在地食材的故事，也是台湾最深刻的人生故事。故事的主角们，有的为着有机农业奋斗打拼，为这片土地奉献青春与血汗。 有的则是经过千百次的调味与尝试，只为了成就一道美味料理。对比着经营者与料理人的故事，他们或是为生活中年转业、或是离乡背井追寻梦想，人生路上各自遭逢百转千折的冲突与适应，才能在逆境中成功蜕变。.

programme.title: 回转干探 Life On Mars - EP 16
programme.desc: Taizhu's plan is thwarted when Detective Li is stabbed by the suspect Jin Xianshuo while trying to get the tape back. Jin Xiansuo also snatched Naying. When they found Naying, her nails have been painted with nail polish. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)嫌疑犯金贤硕在抢回录音带的过程中刺伤李刑警而且也绑架了刑警那英，泰柱的计划失败。当找到她时，那英的手指被图上指甲油。.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 15
programme.desc: (R) Dong Huang goes to the Criminal Bureau to find Eric but is unable to get any updates as there are orders to classify this information as confidential. Dong Huang finds the safe house according to the news and meets Dong Jie. Dong Jie recognises Dong Huang as the Singaporean who was previously wanted. Dong Huang asks Dong Jie about Eric's whereabouts but he decides to follow Brother Fa's orders to not disclose any information, despite him knowing how worried Dong Huang is. (PG)(重)栋煌下山到刑事局找Eric，因Eric的消息被下令保密，令栋煌不得要领。栋煌根据新闻内容找到安全屋，遇到东杰，东杰认出他就是之前被通缉的新加坡人。栋煌向东杰打听Eric的下落，东杰虽知栋煌担心Eric，还是遵照发哥的吩咐，没有透露半句。.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 16
programme.desc: (R) Dong Huang makes his way down to the hospital to find Brother Fa to inquire about Eric's whereabouts and tries to prove that he is Eric's friend. Brother Fa ultimately believes him and allows him to speak to Eric on the phone. Dong Huang informs Eric of Zhen Di's passing. Eric hears Dong Huang's choked voice and realises Dong Huang has fallen for Zhen Di. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)栋煌到医院找到发哥，打探Eric的下落，力证自己是Eric的朋友，发哥最终相信了他，让他和Eric通话。栋煌听到Eric的声音，恍如隔世，告诉Eric甄蒂去世的消息。Eric听着电话那边传来的哽咽声，明白栋煌对甄蒂动了真情。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 2 Sound Of My Dream 2 - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Produced by the same people behind Sing!, Sound of My Dream boasts 5 top-notch mentors, (Sandy Lam, JJ Lin, Yu Quan Group, Jane Zhang), impressive sets and production, and a very unique contest format. The contest witnesses the challenges and preparation each mentor puts into their performances as they prove their worth. And it features stellar performances from mentors and amateurs alike. (重)本季四组常驻导师为羽泉、林忆莲、林俊杰和张靓颖，主持人为华少。另从本季开始新设立客座导师一位，称之为“神秘导师”，每期更换。第二季在选歌方式与上季不同，选歌、定歌都在录影前，练歌则是在录影前6小时之内完成（上季只有3小时，这季增加音樂導師练歌时间）；6小时后在舞台将直接接受追梦歌手讨教。.

programme.title: 有故事的店 Shop Stories - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Set up a restaurant to train their autistic daughter and other autistic, mentally retarded children to be independent. Three students open a candies shop, hire staff with hearing disability. Former psychiatric patients hire single mothers and psychiatric patients to sew handicrafts for living. (重)父母开设餐馆培训自己自闭的女儿和其他自闭，智钝孩子，让他们在学习过程中，学会独立自主。三位学生开设怀旧糖果店，聘请失聪人士当雇员。前精神病患者聘请单亲，精神病患者妈妈们缝制手工艺品谋生。.

programme.title: I'm Madam! - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) After going into BMT, Pepper comes to the shocking realization that army training isn't as easy as how she imagined it to be. In order to learn more about Hulk, Pepper decides to approach Hulk's best friend, Jian Dong, the medical officer. However, to get close him, Pepper will have to fake injury and make many excuses to see the medical officer. Will that eventually get her into trouble? (PG)(重)Pepper以为加入军队是容易的事情，并存有许多幻想。可是开始BMT训练以后，才发现原来是那么的辛苦。运动，跑步，SOC （Standard Obstacle Course）等她都做不来，表现十分差异。建东是BMT里的Medical Officer，发现Pepper假装受伤后，立刻向Sergeant Ong举报，结果Pepper被罚，让Pepper憎恨建东。后来建东找Pepper，告诉Pepper说现在当兵了，要有纪律和分寸，你和Hulk的事情，到了军营外面我会在帮你的。Pepper这时才对建东有所改观。.

programme.title: 长命百二岁 第一辑 As Long As You Live S1 - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Award-winning programme "As Long As You Live" takes a look at how countries face the ageing population and what measures do they take to care for them. (重)全球人口老化，「长命百岁」已经过时，活到百二岁是迟早的事。究竟是祝福，还是诅咒？本台老中青三代记者走访多个亚洲地区包括香港，台湾，日本，南韩，了解他们对人口老化的看法。.

programme.title: 人间蒸发 Missing - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Many Cambodians worked abroad in search of a better living but many ended up missing. In 1970s under the Khmer Rouge rule Cambodia has nearly 2 million of its people either dead or vanished without a trace. What is the truth behind the disappearance? (重)在柬埔寨，许多人为了生存而出国工作，却从此人间蒸发。而70年代柬埔寨经历红色高棉政权统治三年八个月期间，许多人不是死亡，就是失踪。这些人失踪背后的真相，到底是什么？.

programme.title: 上食堂 Food Notes - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) In Japan, there is one food that is ubiquitous as hamburger in the United States, fish and chips in the United Kingdom, and kimchi in Korea. It is not sushi or tempura - it's curry! How did Japanese curry become Japan's national dish? Find out interesting tidbits about Japanese curry on Food Notes. (重)节目让观众大快朵颐之际，也深入了解这些美食背后各个幕后英雄是如何让眼前的美食发扬光大。除了介绍各个厨师、馆子是如何使出十八般武艺烹煮美食外，节目也会将镜头转向养殖场、捕捞过程及相关行业，让观众更全面和深入的了解，这些美食的过去、现在甚至将来！.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 75
programme.desc: (R) Haixiu is informed that ONE's Food wants to sue her for damage of reputation and circulation of rumours. Shimei pleads with Yuzhen to stop Yiyuan from suing Haixiu. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)海秀收到法院寄来的信，ONE’s食品要告海秀名誉毁损及散播谣言。世美拨电给宇真，要求他帮忙阻止艺苑提告。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 76
programme.desc: (R) The families of Yuzhen and Yiyuan meet for their wedding discussions. Guixi puts Yuzhen's family down repeatedly. Displeased with Guixi's behaviour, Xiuzi shames her with her past in the restroom. Yiyuan jumps to Guixi's defence and asks Xiuzi if she wants to jeopardize Yuzhen's chance of becoming her husband. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)宇真和艺苑举行相见礼。贵熙明显看不起宇真的父母。秀子在厕所里把贵熙的往事搬出来羞辱她。艺苑站在贵熙那边，问秀子是否要惹怒贵熙，然后放弃让宇真当ONE's食品的女婿。.

programme.title: 当你沉睡时 While You Were Sleeping - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Jiang Daixi's brother, Bingxi, died in a car accident and Daixi refuses an autopsy on his brother. He declared to Lawyer Li Youfan that he killed him. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)姜玳熙弟弟姜秉熙死于一场车祸中，玳熙不愿秉熙被解剖。同时，玳熙向律师李侑凡声言他杀死亲弟弟。.

programme.title: 当你沉睡时 While You Were Sleeping - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Lawyer Li Youfan defends his accused client, Jiang Daixi, by asserting that there was no autopsy done on Bingxi to verify the cause of his death. After further investigation, Zai Can realises that Bingxi was poisoned by his brother. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)律师李侑凡为姜玳熙辩护说姜秉熙因没做尸检，无法证明秉熙的死因。宰璨再深入调查，发现秉熙是被玳熙毒死的。.

programme.title: 声音的抉择 Singing Choice - EP 4
programme.desc: A music variety where the singer will compose a song and find the right voice to sing it. Featuring singers such as Li Quan, Gary Chaw, Jam Hsiao, Kenji Wu, A-Niu etc. 《声音的抉择》每两期会邀请一位华语乐坛制作人化身声音委托人来到现场，阐述自己的创作理念及择声的标准，通过这个平台为自己最新创作的优质单曲寻找契合的好声音；与此同时，每期节目中声音猎人推荐六位职业歌手，他们作为金曲试唱人站上《声音的抉择》的舞台向声音委托人和观众展示其真挚的歌声，同时借助这个平台寻找契合自己声音的旋律、寻找下一首成名曲。.

programme.title: 怪食记 Weird Food Diaries - EP 4
programme.desc: In "Weird Food Diaries", avid foodie Rosalyn Lee (also known as Rozz) goes in search of Asia's most bizarre eats. Rozz eats away across Japan, Vietnam, Cambodia, Taiwan, Thailand, Korea, Indonesia and the Philippines. Whether it's exotic street food or haute cuisine, Rozz is hungry to try it all! In this episode, there's never a dull moment in her weird food quest in Japan. (PG-部分画面令人不安)在“怪食记"中，狂热的美食家Rosalyn Lee（也称为Rozz）正在寻找亚洲最奇异的食物。Rozz在日本，越南，柬埔寨，台湾，泰国，韩国，印度尼西亚和菲律宾各地旅行,并尝试当地街头奇异美食还是高级美食。在这一集中，她将带大家去日本品尝当地的奇怪的食物。.

programme.title: 偷天任务 Leverage - EP 9
programme.desc: The team finds out that Rengao plans to set fire to the nursing home and collect the old folks' life insurance benefits. Taijun and team immediately put off the fire and rescue Renshu and the other old folks. They then hand Rengao and his father over to the police. . . . . . (PG)(双声道-中/韩)小组发现仁镐计划放火烧疗养院以骗取老人家的人寿保险金后，泰俊和团队立刻设法制止火势，营救仁淑和其他老人家，然后将仁镐和他的父亲交给警察.......

programme.title: 看见看不见的你 I See You - EP 9
programme.desc: Kai En helps 748 plan an escape for Hong Rui Xin, so she can finally find out what happened to her body. Kai En discovers that she and Rui Xin have more in common than being just two girls who lost their bodies. Shi Ping's grandmother, Siew Yue, contemplates retiring as a medium. Ironically, Shi Ping who originally hated his gift of a third eye now wants to help ghosts. (PG-灵异题材)凯恩联手748想帮助洪蕊歆逃出去寻找自己身体的下落。凯恩发现她跟蕊歆之间有很多共同点，并不只是单纯遗失身体的受害者而已。世平的阿嬷秀月考虑退休，不再当灵媒。一直以来都不喜欢自己的阴阳眼的世平，却出乎意料地想要继续帮助那些孤魂野鬼。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight

programme.title: 太阳的后裔 Descendants Of The Sun - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Jiang Muyan got suspicious of Liu Shizhen's job as he had to leave hastily on their dates each time and decided to end their relationship. At the same time, Jiang Muyan was disheartened after losing her promotion to professor due to her family background. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)刘时镇约会时一直临时离开，让姜暮研对刘时镇神秘的工作起疑，决定终止俩人的关系。与此同时，姜暮研得知自己因缺少家庭背景，所盼望已久的教授职位被他人取代，感到十分无奈。.

programme.title: 最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑 Puzzle Masters - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Hosted by Jiang Changjian, "Puzzle Masters" is a reality cum variety programme that showcases individuals with extraordinary brainpower. Wang Feng, Wang Yuhang and Bao Yun serve as team leaders. Tao Jingying is invited as the resident guest of the programme. (重)“最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑"邀具备非凡脑力的天才上节目进行各项挑战，并以科学的方式分析各高手的能力.节目由蒋昌建主持，王峰、王昱行和鲍雲担任队长，陶晶莹则受邀当常驻嘉宾。.

programme.title: 太自游 Funtastic - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Let your hair down and hop on to Channel U's Funtastic ride to the Land of Smiles! Hosts Lee Teng, Julian Hee, Fiona Xie and Ling Lee will show you the true way of fun and adventure as they uncover the exciting hidden gems in Thailand. (重)非一般的旅行，绝对刺激的新体验！李腾，许立桦，谢宛谕和李玲带你探索泰国鲜为人知的旅游宝地，教你如何尽情享受自由旅行之乐，成为一个真正的泰国自游达人！.

programme.title: 食材地图 Our Daily Food - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) This episode, Pornsak learns about dairy goat farming & avocado cultivation in Mornington Peninsula, Australia. Cui Fang takes a look at the production of Chinese cheese, which is a local delicacy of the Bai people, in Yunnan and explores the cultivation & processing of the Korean ginseng in Korea. (重)在这一集节目中，Pornsak前往气候宜人的澳大利亚摩林顿半岛，了解奶山羊的养殖和鳄梨的种植。翠芳则是前往中国云南体验白族人特色食材乳饼的制作，并去到韩国一窥国宝级养生圣品高丽参的种植与加工。.

programme.title: 奇异特工 Odd-upation - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Lover rental is not unusual. Ossan rental is a new rising industry in Japan! With an hourly rate of 1000 yen, these middle-aged men can be of help and company. However, why is ossan rental popular among Japanese females when no one likes their nagging? Let's find out more with the host in Japan. (重)出租情人不稀奇，日本最近兴起一个新的行业「出租大叔」！租金每小时1千日圆，无论让“大叔"陪你聊天、逛街、吃饭、甚至帮忙搬家都没有问题。但印象中，日本人不是最讨厌中年大叔的唠叨吗？那为什么“出租大叔"还颇受日本女性的青睐呢？请跟随奇异特工黄靖伦到日本一探究竟。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) The Philippines Emergency Grab and Go Bags The Philippines - a country that has to face the fury of typhoons every year. Coping with the aftermath of natures fearsome force - where everything is destroyed or damaged - is a grave matter. Host Pei Fen volunteers with Mercy Relief for a long trek into a hilly and remote Cagayan region, bringing with her "Emergency Grab and Go Bags" that could well be a matter of life and death for the indigenous communities in the next typhoon strike. (重)六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 整形背后 Plastic Surgery Is My Business - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Gracia and Lily are two different women facing different problems with their looks, but they have similar insecurities and anxieties. How does body image weigh in as a decisive factor for getting plastic surgery, and how does the plastic surgeon ensure a healthy balance between function and form? (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)两名妇女Gracia 和 Lily 都以为自己的容貌问题而找上了姚国龙整形外科医生。在听取了她们各自的要求后，整形外科医生要如何在功能与外观之间找到健康的平衡点呢？.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 77
programme.desc: (R) Shanying pleads with Xiuzi to treat Haixiu like her own daughter. Soon after, Shanying leaves a sum of money for Haixiu and leaves quietly. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)善英约秀子见面，希望秀子把海秀当成女儿般照顾。善英不希望海秀捐肾给她，留下一笔钱给海秀后，静悄悄地离开。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 78
programme.desc: (R) Zhiyuan tells Yuzhen the truth behind the soy sauce incident. Yuzhen wants Yiyuan to own up to her mistakes, but Yiyuan refuses to do so. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)宇真碰到喝醉的智沅，从智沅口中知道魔法酱油事件的真相 - 艺苑偷了海秀的酱油配方。宇真要艺苑承认错误，艺苑反要宇真把他知道的全忘掉。宇真说不能再让艺苑践踏柔弱的人。.

programme.title: 当你沉睡时 While You Were Sleeping - EP 9
programme.desc: (R) Han Yuzhuo gets injured while saving Hong Zhu from Jiang Daixi. Feeling guilty, Hong Zhu invites him to stay at her place so that she can take care of him during his recovery. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)为了救红珠，韩禹卓被姜玳熙刺伤。因为觉的内疚，红珠让禹卓住在她家疗养，照顾他。.

programme.title: 当你沉睡时 While You Were Sleeping - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) National Shooter, Liu Xiujing is found dead in her house; Internet serviceman Du Herong becomes the prime suspect. Afraid of being arrested, Herong seeks help from Han Yuzhuo, his former roommate. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)射箭女皇柳秀静被发现死在家里，网络维修员都鹤荣被怀疑为凶手。因害怕被逮捕，鹤荣向前室友韩禹卓求救。.

programme.title: 我想和你唱3 Come Sing With Me 3 - EP 9
programme.desc: An interactive music variety show where ordinary people have an opportunity to sing together with celebrity pop singers. First, the celebrity pop singers featured in that episode (there are usually three total) are shown singing one of their well-known songs in the studio. Fans are shown singing along simultaneously in UGC clips showing people singing into their computers or mobile phones from wherever they are. Some are shown singing into their headphones from their offices, etc. 《我想和你唱第三季》除了继续延续前两季“星素同框同台合唱"的核心节目模式，还将星素互动环节进行了升级。该节目嘉宾阵容相比前两季会更年轻化，更多90后、00后喜爱的偶像都会参与进来。节目中新增的CALLOUT环节，邀请的大来宾会亲自电话邀请三位幸运观众，请他们24小时之内赶到录制现场，获得10秒同唱机会。.

programme.title: 偷天任务 Leverage - EP 10
programme.desc: Taijun is shocked after he discovers that his best friend, Junheng, is the mysterious man who has been monitoring the court proceedings. Looking back on all the incidents, he begins to suspect that Junheng is the mastermind behind the whole team... (PG)(双声道-中/韩)泰俊发现他最好的朋友俊亨就是一直在监视法庭的神秘人物时，感到震惊。回顾所有发生的事件后，他开始怀疑俊亨是整个团队的幕后黑手......

programme.title: 看见看不见的你 I See You - EP 10
programme.desc: 748 and Kai En are tasked with bringing in the ghost with the longest truancy record in their department Xiao Bao, a little boy who went missing forty years ago when he was ten. He has died since, but his spirit continues to wander, searching for the truth as well as his family. In the process of helping Xiao Bao, Kai En and Shi Ping discover a vital clue that might lead them to the person responsible for Kai En's condition. (PG-灵异题材)748和凯恩接到任务，负责逮捕潜逃最久的鬼魂 –-小宝。四十年前，只有十岁小宝失踪，不久后就死去了。他的灵魂四处流离，一边寻找他死去的真相，一边寻找回家的路。在帮助小宝的过程中，凯恩和世平发现了跟凯恩身体失踪案的加害者有关的重要线索。.

programme.title: Priyasakhi - EP 229
programme.desc: 'Priyasakhi' is about the life of Dhivya. She has parents who are uncaring and partial, siblings who are jealous and cunning, husband who married her just for challenge and thrill, and in-laws who are unsympathetic and refuse to endorse the marriage.

programme.title: Ishq Ka Rang Safed - EP 0310&0311
programme.desc: Ishq Ka Rang Safed is set amidst the traditional old city of Banaras in Northern India. Biplab is the carefree, spoilt grandson of the town leader who is slated to go abroad for his law studies. His life takes an abrupt turn when he encounters Dhaani. Dhaani, a young widow leading a life of dignity abiding by her Dharma is a conformist, yet a strong minded individual.

programme.title: Motu Patlu 3 - EP 59
programme.desc: Motu and Patlu, two friends living in Furfuri Naga, have a penchant to land themselves in comical situations, later rescuing themselves only by sheer luck. A criminal named John, intends to become a don, but his plans always fail due to the heroic actions of Motu and Patlu, who trap and expose him and his plans.

programme.title: Theriyatha Tamil Cinema 3 - Thirai Isai Paadalgal(HD) - EP 25
programme.desc: Theriyatha Tamil Cinema Thirai Isai Paadalgal is an hour long entertainment that features golden numbers ranging from all eras written by epic lyricists like Kannadasan, Vaali, Vairamuthu, Pa Vijay, etc. Note-worthy lyrics that add more beauty and meaning to the Tamil language will be discussed.

programme.title: Thayangaathey - EP 10
programme.desc: Thayangaathey, is a health documentary-drama, that is centred around 13 unique case studies who suffer from chronic, life-altering diseases. The intent of the programme is to educate viewers of these illnesses, the symptoms to look out for, the probability of them succumbing to these illnesses, early detection and so on.
